boardgame.description: The third Master Set for the HeroScape series of games, which crosses over into the realm of Dungeons and Dragons. Includes 10 rebased figures from Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Miniatures and 55 Heroscape-style terrain pieces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Beware the Jaws of the Dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Evil monsters emerge from the darkest corners of Valhalla, spreading terror as they conquer and control the mystic portals that lead to other worlds. Sinister drow and brutal trolls gather in underground ruins, and rumors of black dragons are too terrifying to ignore._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The hordes of evil must be stopped. The Valkyrie Generals representing the forces of good have summoned brave adventurers, who together embark on a quest to defeat the black dragons and their wicked allies. Will they prevail or perish?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Wizards of the Coast - Master Set 3: Battle for the Underdark Language: English Weight: 1.230 kg/pack New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Theme: Evil monsters emerge from the darkest corners of Valhalla, spreading terror as they conquer and control the mystic portals that lead to other worlds. Sinister dark elves and brutal trolls gather in underground ruins, and rumors of black dragons are too terrifying to ignore. The hordes of evil must be stopped. The Valkyrie Generals representing the forces of good have summoned brave adventurers, who together embark on a quest to defeat the black dragons and their wicked allies. Will they prevail or perish? Iconic Characters and monsters with the ultimate build and battle miniatures game to bring new dimensions of fun for everyone! The game is fully compatible with other Heroscape expansions. The new master set includes a rulebook, 10 figures, 50 configurable terrain pieces and customizable game scenarios, which bring new dimensions to the popular build-and-battle miniatures game. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Heroscape collection. This set is a combination of many sets. Most boxes and original packaging no longer exists for it as most is stored together. A few minor pieces may be missing from Fortress of Archkyrie set and Rise of the Valkyrie set as they were bought used, as is. Rise of Valkyrie is first edition with the sparkly water tiles. Further info and pics available upon request. Market value on this collection is over $600 (allowing for less due to lack of boxes/packaging). Sets included: â€¢Rise of the Valkyrie (1st ed) â€¢Swarm of the Marro â€¢Marvel the Conflict Begins â€¢Battle for the Underdark â€¢Fortress of the Archkyrie x2 â€¢Road to Forgotten Forest x2 â€¢Ticalla Jungle Figure sets: â€¢Heroes of Bleakwoode â€¢The IX Roman Legion â€¢Snipers _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Vipers â€¢Grut Orcs â€¢Heroes of Molten Sea â€¢Militia _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Wolves â€¢Warriors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Soulborgs â€¢Galen Bog Raiders â€¢Soulborgs â€¢Heroes of Faerun â€¢Warriors of Ghostlight Fen This collection is very large and can only be shipped within Canada due to size and weight. This will be expensive to ship even within Canada.
